Grand MasterAnswered on 16 Sep 2019You need statements of all your previous and current loans1) car loan2) existing property loan3) statements of all existing credit cards, even those you had not used, but possess.4) salary slip, CPF, income notice of assessment5) any other loan information, such as student loans. etcWith the above, you can send to the bank and apply and it will take you just a week or so to get their reply. Actually I got my reply in 3 days. Loan for a commercial loan is even faster, I think I got an answer by 2nd day.0 comments1
